mdRecord.dcterms:description: References to a band, a rap song, UVA's 2019 NCAA basketball championship, and Tiger Woods' fifth win at the Masters Golf tournament [work]
Student graffiti art and messages inscribed on carrel walls in the new stacks, Alderman Library, University of Virginia, prior to the renovation of the building, 2020-2023. [host]
FUGAZI I WOKE UP IN A NEW BUGATTI | Natty Champs 4-8-19 | T Woods 5th green jacket 4-14-19
